intro: Welcome to the Applications section of ZIKYinc. Here you'll find a variety of tools and software developed by our team to enhance creativity and productivity.

windows_tools.title: AudioMixer Pro
windows_tools.description: A powerful audio mixing tool for Windows, designed for both beginners and professionals.

ai_tools.title: LyricGen AI
ai_tools.description: An AI-powered lyric generator that helps songwriters overcome writer's block.

misc.title: ZIKYTracker
misc.description: A project management tool tailored for music and art collaborations.
